---
title: "Journal of Political Economy <br> Data Editor Website"
---

This website provides relevant information regarding the [Data and Code Availability Policy](policy.qmd) and pre-acceptance reproducibility checks implemented at the JPE. 



::: {.columns}
::: {.column width=48% .left-col}
**Schematic overview of the process:**


```{mermaid}
%%| fig-cap: Reproducibility Process. Notice that confidential data can be shared with the Data Editor for the purpose of checks, while it will be excluded from the published package on dataverse.
flowchart TD
  X(Paper<br>conditionally accepted) --> A
  A(Author fills out <br> Data Availability Form) --> B(Data Editor<br>sends <i>private</i><br>upload link)
  B --> C{Checks pass}
  C --> D[Yes: author uploads<br>to dataverse]
  C --> E[No: package goes<br>back to authors]
  E --> B
```

:::
::: {.column width=4%}
:::
::: {.column width=48% .right-col}
